Text:
1. Draw Phase
2. Action Phase
3. Battle Phase     
    a. Attack Declaration Step
    b. Pre-Combat Action Step   
    c. Defense Declaration Step
    d. Combat Step          
        i. Attacker Declare Help Defense          
        ii. Defender Declare Help Defense          
        iii. Deal Surprise Damage
        iv. Deal Normal Damage
    e. Post-Combat Action Step
    f. Siege Step
4. Final Action Phase
5. Deployment Phase
